author: Warhammer
description:
How many bits could a bits box box if a bits box could box bits? Well, seeing as it isn’t sentient and doesn’t have arms or hands, probably not many. But what it can do really well is organise your spare Warhammer pieces, ready for you to plunder for an amazing kitbash! 

Today Jake runs through the making of a bits box and makes some cool Emperor’s Children Terminators at the same time! 

If you're new to painting, our Citadel Colour Painting Essentials playlist hosts an array of beginner-friendly videos to help you get started.

Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

title: Kitbashing PERFECT Emperor’s Children Terminators & Building a Chaos Bits Box | Warhammer 40,000
